page.title: 13CHILDRENS CLUBS IN HARLOW .
page.content: {Many clubs happen at school,e.g.stamp {collecting,books,polymath,gym, country {dancing,football and netball;outside {school many sports clubs,guides and {horse-riding are popular. Here are a {few club details. "I started{Dancing}when I was five. I go to 'tap' and 'modern' - a sort of jazz. I wear a catsuit and legwarmers" "When you join{Scouts}you are invested and get badges. Each August you go to camp under canvas." {"Music School}is on Saturday mornings. You can learn violin, piano, flute or recorder. You have to do aural and theory." "I go to{St.John's Ambulance}because I want to be a nurse. We have to do lots of bandages and artificial respiration and we have pretend blood and flesh coloured plasticine. We do lots of treating wounds and it is great fun."
